lead_paragraph: The rookie Dylan Larkin had a goal and an assist, and Petr Mrazek made 28 saves for Detroit, which won at Joe Louis Arena for the first time since Dec. 20.

headline.main: Red Wings Step Up at Home, Thrashing Islanders
headline.print_headline: Red Wings Step Up at Home, Thrashing Islanders
